## ScrollTargetSelector.setScrollTarget() method

Sets callback used for obtaining scroll target

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setScrollTarget(callback: () => EventTarget): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | () =&gt; EventTarget | Callback that is used for obtaining scroll target element |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
